thread.title: Justin Timberlake sarcastically takes on Kanye West’s VMA jab
thread.title_full: Justin Timberlake sarcastically takes on Kanye West’s VMA jab | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Justin Timberlake sarcastically takes on Kanye West’s VMA jab
text:
Justin Timberlake can definitely speak sarcasm fluently as recently he responded to Kanye West’s 2015 MTV’s VMAs’ jab about him where he cynicistically tweeted that the rapper was just being “cute”.
Justin Timberlake later, to support his initial tweet and to get away for being sarcastic allegations by fans, wrote that he was just joking and after watching the entire speech he realised that the 38-year-old rapper talked about many other things and had a point, E! Online reported.
West had poked fun on Timberlake during his speech, claiming that the singer cried when he lost the race of Album of the Year in 2013 and added that the American singer deserved to win the award.
First Published on September 01, 2015 5:03 pm
